document.full_text: icelanders began voting on saturday whether to approve a plan to repay debts to britain and the netherlands with opinion polls suggesting another rejection, dampening hopes for progress in the island's economic recovery.
document.title: icelandic voters unlikely to approve icesave deal
lines_and_colors: icelanders began voting on saturday whether to approve a plan to repay debts to britain and the netherlands with opinion polls suggesting another rejection, dampening hopes for progress in the island's economic recovery.
